trans-unit.source: This class is used by a spline key frame to define animation progress.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別可供曲線主要畫面格定義的動畫進度。

trans-unit.source: To understand how a KeySpline works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: 若要瞭解如何運作的 KeySpline，最好先了解三次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points.
trans-unit.target: 起點、 結束點，以及兩個控制點會定義三次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: The two coordinates in the KeySpline defines those two control points.
trans-unit.target: 兩個座標的 KeySpline 中定義的兩個控制點。

trans-unit.source: When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points.
trans-unit.target: 描述關鍵 spline 貝茲曲線的開始點一律是 0，並結束點永遠為 1，這就是為什麼您只定義兩個控制點。

trans-unit.source: The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment.
trans-unit.target: 產生的曲線指定動畫如何插補期間的時間區段。也就是說，曲線代表時間區段中動畫的目標屬性變更的速率。

trans-unit.source: To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).
trans-unit.target: 若要進一步了解貝茲曲線的動畫進度之間的關聯性，請參閱[金鑰曲線動畫範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *cp1X* component of the curve's first control point.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*cp1X* 元件曲線的第一個控制點。

trans-unit.source: The value must be between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 值必須介於 0 和 1 之間。

trans-unit.source: *cp1Y* <xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A> component of the curve's first control point.
trans-unit.target: *cp1Y* <xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A>元件曲線的第一個控制點。</xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value must be between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 值必須介於 0 和 1 之間。

trans-unit.source: *cp2X* <xref:System.Windows.Point.X%2A> component of the curve's second control point.
trans-unit.target: *cp2X* <xref:System.Windows.Point.X%2A>元件曲線的第二個控制點。</xref:System.Windows.Point.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value must be between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 值必須介於 0 和 1 之間。

trans-unit.source: *cp2Y* <xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A> component of the curve's second control point.
trans-unit.target: *cp2Y* <xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A>元件曲線的第二個控制點。</xref:System.Windows.Point.Y%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value must be between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 值必須介於 0 和 1 之間。

trans-unit.source: The separator between values may be either comma or one or more spaces.
trans-unit.target: 值之間的分隔符號可能是任一個逗號或一或多個空格。

trans-unit.source: The convention shown here of commas between components of a point and space between points is a recommended convention.
trans-unit.target: 如下所示的慣例的某個點的元件與點之間的空間之間的逗號是建議的慣例。

trans-unit.source: Do not use a comma as the decimal point within the values of point components, even if that is the norm in your culture.
trans-unit.target: 即使您的文化特性中的範，請勿為點元件的值內小數點使用逗號。

trans-unit.source: XAML values are treated as en-us in all type conversion cases, and the comma is thus interpreted as the separator and not as the intended decimal point.
trans-unit.target: XAML 值會被視為 en-我們在類型轉換的情況下和逗號會做為分隔符號，而不是預期的小數點因此被解譯。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The default values for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint2%2A> are (0,0) and (1,1) respectively, which has no effect on the progress of an animation or key frame.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint1%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint2%2A>是 (0，0) 和 (1，1) 分別具有動畫或索引鍵的畫面格進度的任何作用。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref> class with the specified control points.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>類別指定的控制點。

trans-unit.source: The control point for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint1*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 控制點<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint1*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint1*>

trans-unit.source: The control point for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint2*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 控制點<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint2*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint2*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref> class with the specified coordinates for the control points.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>指定座標的控點的類別。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint1*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: X 座標<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint1*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint1*>

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint1*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Y 座標<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint1*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint1*>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint2*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: X 座標<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint2*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint2*>

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint2*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Y 座標<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint2*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline.ControlPoint2*>

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a deep copy of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 使這個執行個體指定的深層複本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立目前物件的可修改複本，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>而不是直接呼叫這個方法。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref> to clone.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>複製。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a modifiable deep copy of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref> using current property values.
trans-unit.target: 使這個執行個體所指定的可修改深層複本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>使用目前的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立目前物件的可修改複本，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>而不是直接呼叫這個方法。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref> to clone.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>複製。

trans-unit.source: The first control point used to define a Bezier curve that describes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 用來定義描述貝茲曲線的第一個控制點<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To understand how a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline> works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline>運作方式，最好先了解三次方貝茲曲線。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline>

trans-unit.source: A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points.
trans-unit.target: 起點、 結束點，以及兩個控制點會定義三次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: The two coordinates in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline> defines those two control points.
trans-unit.target: 在兩個座標<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline>定義這些兩個控制點。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline>

trans-unit.source: When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points.
trans-unit.target: 描述關鍵 spline 貝茲曲線的開始點一律是 0，並結束點永遠為 1，這就是為什麼您只定義兩個控制點。

trans-unit.source: The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment.
trans-unit.target: 產生的曲線指定動畫如何插補期間的時間區段。也就是說，曲線代表時間區段中動畫的目標屬性變更的速率。

trans-unit.source: To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).
trans-unit.target: 若要進一步了解貝茲曲線的動畫進度之間的關聯性，請參閱[金鑰曲線動畫範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。

trans-unit.source: The Bezier curve's first control point.
trans-unit.target: 將貝茲曲線的第一個控制點。

trans-unit.source: The point's <xref:System.Windows.Point.X*> and <xref:System.Windows.Point.Y*> values must each be between 0 and 1, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 點的<> *> 和<> *> 值必須介於 0 和 1 (含) 之間。

trans-unit.source: The default value is (0,0).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 (0，0)。

trans-unit.source: The second control point used to define a Bezier curve that describes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 用來定義描述貝茲曲線的第二個控制點<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The two coordinates in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline> defines those two control points.

trans-unit.source: When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points.

trans-unit.source: The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment.
trans-unit.target: 產生的曲線指定動畫如何插補期間的時間區段。也就是說，曲線代表時間區段中動畫的目標屬性變更的速率。

trans-unit.source: To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).

trans-unit.source: The Bezier curve's second control point.
trans-unit.target: 將貝茲曲線的第二個控制點。

trans-unit.source: The point's <xref:System.Windows.Point.X*> and <xref:System.Windows.Point.Y*> values must each be between 0 and 1, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 點的<> *> 和<> *> 值必須介於 0 和 1 (含) 之間。

trans-unit.source: The default value is (1,1).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 (1，1)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 使這個執行個體的指定複製品<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，如果這些屬性包含資源的參考或資料繫結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>失敗時嘗試凍結物件，並將擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立目前物件的凍結的複本，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>而不是直接呼叫這個方法。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref> object to clone.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>来複製的物件。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a frozen clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 使這個執行個體指定的凍結的複製品<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A>方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A>

trans-unit.target: 若要建立目前物件的凍結的複本，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A>而不是直接呼叫這個方法。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A>

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref> to copy and freeze.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>来複製和凍結。

trans-unit.source: Calculates spline progress from a supplied linear progress.
trans-unit.target: 計算曲線級數從提供的線性級數。

trans-unit.source: To understand how a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline> works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline>運作方式，最好先了解三次方貝茲曲線。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline>

trans-unit.source: A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points.
trans-unit.target: 起點、 結束點，以及兩個控制點會定義三次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: The two coordinates in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline> defines those two control points.
trans-unit.target: 在兩個座標<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline>定義這些兩個控制點。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline>

trans-unit.source: When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points.
trans-unit.target: 描述關鍵 spline 貝茲曲線的開始點一律是 0，並結束點永遠為 1，這就是為什麼您只定義兩個控制點。

trans-unit.source: The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment.
trans-unit.target: 產生的曲線指定動畫如何插補期間的時間區段。也就是說，曲線代表時間區段中動畫的目標屬性變更的速率。

trans-unit.source: To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).
trans-unit.target: 若要進一步了解貝茲曲線的動畫進度之間的關聯性，請參閱[金鑰曲線動畫範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。

trans-unit.source: The linear progress to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 要評估的線性級數。

trans-unit.source: The calculated spline progress.
trans-unit.target: 計算的曲線級數。

trans-unit.source: Called when the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref> object is modified.
trans-unit.target: 時呼叫目前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>物件遭到修改。

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體使用指定的格式將值格式化。

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.
trans-unit.target: -null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 若要使用的類型所定義的預設格式<xref:System.IFormattable>實作。</xref:System.IFormattable>

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 要用來格式化值提供者。

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: -null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 從目前的地區設定的作業系統取得的數值格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體中指定的格式的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref> based on the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 建立的這個執行個體的字串表示<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>根據目前文化特性。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串表示<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref> based on the supplied <xref:System.IFormatProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個字串表示法<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>根據提供的<xref:System.IFormatProvider>.</xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: The format provider to use.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的格式提供者。

trans-unit.source: If provider is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供者<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，會使用目前文化特性。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體的字串表示<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>。
